subject: Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Casey Lambert and Chantal Sutherland were the part of the Mine That Bird team that were left behind when the he began his long journey to Churchill Downs from New Mexico.
snippet: Casey Lambert and Chantal Sutherland were the part of the Mine That Bird team that were left behind when the he began his long journey to Churchill Downs from New Mexico.
